description: A classic collared summer staple that brings casual airy vibes to the cookout, campsite, or beach getaway. The Eldridge has the looks of a spiffy, office- or drinks-downtown-worthy button down with the soft finish and relaxed fit you need to comfortably wind down far from any skyscrapers or cocktail bar. Surrounded by friends, trees, or both, the Eldridge thrives in the heat of the summer sun and the freedom of the trail ahead. When you're packing light for a trip, the Eldridge is a must-have for its chameleon-like ability to transition between every activity, morning to night.
name: Marmot Eldridge Novelty Classic SS - Mens
